text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for April 7 to April 13, 2025, includes 2073 (2024), 90 Day Diaries Season 6, Hacks Season 4, and The Last of Us Season 2. On April 7, 2073 (2024) drops on HBO Max. The documentary drama showcases the dystopian world of New San Francisco in 2073. In this world, everything is dominated by tech with no sense of freedom and safety. Further, 90 Day Diaries Season 6 will be available on the streaming platform. The reality show delves deep into the lives of couples from the 90-Day Fiancé franchise. Without any camera crew, the couples navigate through the daily issues in their lives while putting their relationship on the line. Also coming out on HBO Max is Hacks Season 4. The comedy-drama series follows a twisted relationship between a legendary comedian and an unemployed writer. Season 4 is expected to be a notch higher in terms of twists and drama. Additionally, The Last of Us Season 2 premieres on the streaming platform. Season 2 begins five years after the previous season’s events. Based on the happenings of The Last of Us Part II game, it showcases Ellie and Joel handling their relationship while living in Jackson, Wyoming. Further, the duo realizes the world is now more dangerous than before. New HBO Max releases for April 7 – April 13 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from April 7 – April 13, 2025. April 7 2073 (2024) Barney’s World, Season 1C April 8 90 Day Diaries, Season 6 (TLC) April 9 All Access PD: Grand Rapids, Season 1 (ID) April 10 Gremlins: The Wild Batch, Season 2B (Max Original) Hacks, Season 4 (Max Original) April 13 The Last of Us, Season 2 (HBO Original) For more HBO Max content, check out the meaning of The White Lotus Season 3 finale’s title. Also, here is The Rehearsal Season 2 trailer.
html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for April 7 to April 13, 2025, includes 2073 (2024), 90 Day Diaries Season 6, Hacks Season 4, and The Last of Us Season 2.

On April 7, 2073 (2024) drops on HBO Max. The documentary drama showcases the dystopian world of New San Francisco in 2073. In this world, everything is dominated by tech with no sense of freedom and safety.

Further, 90 Day Diaries Season 6 will be available on the streaming platform. The reality show delves deep into the lives of couples from the 90-Day Fiancé franchise. Without any camera crew, the couples navigate through the daily issues in their lives while putting their relationship on the line.

Also coming out on HBO Max is Hacks Season 4. The comedy-drama series follows a twisted relationship between a legendary comedian and an unemployed writer. Season 4 is expected to be a notch higher in terms of twists and drama.

Additionally, The Last of Us Season 2 premieres on the streaming platform. Season 2 begins five years after the previous season’s events. Based on the happenings of The Last of Us Part II game, it showcases Ellie and Joel handling their relationship while living in Jackson, Wyoming. Further, the duo realizes the world is now more dangerous than before.

New HBO Max releases for April 7 – April 13 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from April 7 – April 13, 2025.

April 7

  • 2073 (2024)
  • Barney’s World, Season 1C

April 8

  • 90 Day Diaries, Season 6 (TLC)

April 9

  • All Access PD: Grand Rapids, Season 1 (ID)

April 10

  • Gremlins: The Wild Batch, Season 2B (Max Original)
  • Hacks, Season 4 (Max Original)

April 13

  • The Last of Us, Season 2 (HBO Original)

For more HBO Max content, check out the meaning of The White Lotus Season 3 finale’s title. Also, here is The Rehearsal Season 2 trailer.
